docTitle.titlePart: A Generalized Debye Scattering Formula and the Hankel Transform

byline.affiliation: TU Darmstadt, FB Materialwissenschaft, FG Stmkturforschung,

front.div:
The diffracted intensity of an x-ray or neutron diffraction experiment is expressed as an integral
over an atomic position distribution function. A generalized Debye scattering formula results.
Since this distribution funcdon is expanded into a series of spherical harmonics, an inverse Hankel
Uransform of the intensity allows die calculation of die expansion coefficients which describe
the atomic arrangement completely. The connections between the generalized Debye scattering
formula and the original Debye formula as well as the Laue scattering formula are derived.
front.keywords: Key words: X-ray Scattering; Debye Formula; Hankel Transform.
